about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Not all gifts are the same. Some whisper what words can never say.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At Forma, we believe that every fingerprint tells a story, every touch holds a memory, and every heart deserves to leave an everlasting mark. We transform priceless moments into timeless works of art that speak to the soul and last forever.

process.title: Our Process
process.content: Using premium German skin-safe silicone, we create precise molds of body parts — the hand of a loved one, a child's tiny fingerprint, or a mother's gentle palm — and turn them into fine jewelry or 3D sculptures filled with emotion.

quality.title: Quality & Craftsmanship
quality.content: Each piece is crafted with the precision of an artist, the passion of a lover, and the elegance of gold. It's not just a gift… It's a symbol of love, memory, and eternity.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.content: We collaborate with artists, sculptors, and families who wish to preserve their memories in a meaningful way. Our creations unite art, science, and humanity, ensuring your mark remains eternal.

about.closing: Because some memories are meant to be touched. Forma – crafting impressions that never fade.

privacy.title: Formashop – Privacy Policy & Terms of Sale

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Formashop, we respect your privacy and protect your personal data in accordance with Dutch and European data protection laws (GDPR). This policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We only collect information necessary for processing your orders and customer support:
items: Technical data (IP address, browser type, cookies)

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: Personal data is retained for seven (7) years, as required by Dutch law for accounting and tax purposes, unless earlier deletion is permitted by law.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: Your data may be shared with trusted providers such as payment and delivery services. We do not sell or exchange your personal data with third parties.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You can request access, correction, or deletion of your data at any time by contacting us at info@formashop.nl.

security.title: Security
security.content: We use SSL encryption, firewalls, and secure servers to protect your information from unauthorized access.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Cookies are used to improve your browsing experience. You can disable them in your browser settings.

children.title: Children
children.content: We do not target or knowingly collect data from individuals below the legal age.

updates.title: Updates
updates.content: This policy may be updated periodically. Changes will be published on this page.

general.title: General
general.content: All prices include applicable taxes, unless otherwise indicated. Orders are only confirmed after receipt of full payment.

shipping.title: Shipping
shipping.content: Orders are shipped as soon as possible. Delivery times depend on the product and destination. Customers are responsible for providing accurate shipping information.

returns.title: Returns & Refunds
returns.content: We do not accept returns for products received in good condition and matching their online description and photos. Refunds are only granted if:
items: The item is defective due to our error
returns.note: Customers must contact us within 48 hours of receipt, with supporting photos or video. We may request return of the product for inspection before approving a refund.

payments.title: Payments
payments.content: All transactions are processed securely through certified payment providers.

liability.title: Liability
liability.content: Our maximum liability is limited to the total value of the order. We are not responsible for delays caused by carriers or force majeure.

jurisdiction.title: Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.content: All sales and disputes are governed by Dutch law. The competent courts of the Netherlands have exclusive jurisdiction.

hero.title: Welcome to Forma
hero.subtitle: Transform your precious moments into timeless art

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have a question, feedback, or just want to say hello — our team is here to help. Fill out the form and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
